ca.ualberta.cs.team07recipefinder
Class SqlClient

java.lang.Object
  SQLiteOpenHelper
      ca.ualberta.cs.team07recipefinder.SqlClient

public class SqlClient
extends SQLiteOpenHelper

A helper class for the Sqlite database that stores the user's locally cached recipes. Recipes can be added to the database, deleted, and updated.

Author:
gcoomber

checkRow

public boolean checkRow(java.util.UUID recipeId)
Query the database to check if a Recipe exits with the recipeId. Return true if row exists, false if row does not exist.

Parameters:
recipeId -
Returns:
Boolean on whether row exists.
